basics.name: johnson Pham
basics.label:
•	More than 9 years of experience in Software Development Industry and professional environments. 
•	Have experience in Graphic Use Interface (Design web graphic, web application, software, logo…), analysis use case, flow, make mockup, wireframes, Front End by HTML4, HTML5, CSS2, CSS3, Jquery and JavaScript, Ext Js, Backbone JS, Underscore JS, Angular js, Responsive web design, mail letter and responsive mail letter.
